course.subject: MGMT
course.name: Global Leadership
course.description: Global Leadership is a course designed to inform and inspire MBA students to evolve in their development as Global Leaders.  Drawing from the instructorâ€™s extensive experience in Researching, Teaching and Practicing leadership, students will be provided with actual experiences and lessons learned from the instructor.  This course will help students enhance their self-awareness, improve their communication skills, build deeper connections and trust with classmates and give them deeper knowledge in the principles of leadership. Combined, all these learning's have the potential to propel students in their career development.  Ample case study and group work and reflection time will be provided to support learning objectives.
